title: "Home"
---

```{=tex}


\begin{equation}
  \text{logit}(P(y = 1 \mid \mathbf{x})) = \beta_0 + \beta_1 \cdot \text{age} + \beta_2 \cdot \text{sex} + \beta_3 \cdot \text{episode\_number}
\end{equation}

where:

\begin{equation}
  \text{logit}(P) = \log \left( \frac{P}{1 - P} \right)
\end{equation}

The probability of the outcome (survival) is:

\begin{equation}
  P(y = 1 \mid \mathbf{x}) = \frac{1}{1 + \exp\left( - (\beta_0 + \beta_1 \cdot \text{age} + \beta_2 \cdot \text{sex} + \beta_3 \cdot \text{episode\_number}) \right)}
\end{equation}

The priors for the parameters are:

\begin{equation}
  \beta_i \sim \mathcal{N}(0, 5) \quad \text{for} \quad i = 0, 1, 2, 3
\end{equation}
```
